content: TE-S TI Tile chisels Self-sharpening TE-S tile chisels for scraping away surface materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-sharpening cutting edge – work more efficiently and for longer with the same chisel, no resharpening or rehardening necessary Better ergonomics – angled offset head allows comfortable work flush on the surface High-alloy steel – for more reliable and consistent chisel quality Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Improved reliability – dust cap helps to avoid downtime and improve tool lifespan Applications Removing tile, laminate or other composite material Flush surface material removal, such as weld spatter, scale or concrete formwork seepage For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Application: Tile removal Length: 19.7 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Application | Tile removal | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429813 - Tile chisel TE-S TI 50/12 - Package Size 1 pc
